The Ball Court Game (Juego de pelota maya)
In the ancient mayan civilisation, the players used a tightened leather ball, and they had to pass the ball in the middle of those rings located at the top of two tall walls. They shouldn't touch the ball with the hands, they was supossed to hit the ball with the hips.
The history sais that the prize for the winners was the 'high privilege' to offer themselves like human sacrifice to their gods.
The winner team, not the loser one.
Due they wanted to offer just the best to their gods, not the losers.
